members.member:
Checks to see if there is any update avalible.
Name of the program to check. true if there are updates.

member.name: M:AutoUpdater.AutoUpdater.GetSHA3HashFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the SHA3 hash from file. Adapted from https://stackoverflow.com/a/16318156/1460422.

member.name: T:AutomationTestingProgram.Logger
member.summary: Logger class to be used. \n Reference 1: https://stackify.com/log4net-guide-dotnet-logging/ \n Reference 2: https://www.dotnetdepth.in/2018/06/how-to-use-log4net-in-net-core-20.html.

member.name: M:AutomationTestingProgram.Logger.Debug(System.Object)
member.summary: Allows the user to log a debug message.
member.param: The debug message to be logged.

member.name: M:AutomationTestingProgram.Logger.Error(System.Object)
member.summary: Allows the user to log an error message.
member.param: The error message to be logged.

member.name: M:AutomationTestingProgram.Logger.Fatal(System.Object)
member.summary: Allows the user to log a fatal message.
member.param: The fatal message to be logged.

member.name: M:AutomationTestingProgram.Logger.Info(System.Object)
member.summary: Allows the user to log an info message.
member.param: The info message to be logged.

member.name: M:AutomationTestingProgram.Logger.Warn(System.Object)
member.summary: Allows the user to log a warning message.
member.param: The warning message to be logged.

member.name: M:AutomationTestingProgram.Logger.GetLogger(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the type for the logger.
